amendatorysection.catchline: License; revoke, cancel, or suspend; procedure.
amendatorysection.para: The Tax Commissioner may revoke, cancel, or suspend any license for a violation of the Tobacco Products Tax Act or any rule or regulation adopted and promulgated by the Tax Commissioner in administering the act. If a license is revoked, canceled, or suspended, the licensee shall immediately surrender such license to the Tax Commissioner. No determination of revocation, cancellation, or suspension shall be made until notice has been given and a hearing has been held by the Tax Commissioner as provided in section 77-4019, if requested by the licensee.
